author: _shemnon
content: One thing I forgot about but was reminded of while de-spamming my discord: Do we want to formally add "prepare for address space expansion" to the list of opcode changes?  It would be enumerating the opcodes that accept addresses beyond call, which I think is allready taken care of for the CALLS, just need to add BALANCE and one other I can't think of right now.
